sqls.sql: SELECT wkc_priority, wkc_no, wkc_is_enabled, wkc_is_default, wkt_before_c, wkt_after_c, wkt_produce_c, qty_produce_c, wkt_worker_c, wkc_worker_num_c, wkt_before_b, wkt_after_b, wkt_produce_b, qty_produce_b, wkt_worker_b, wkc_worker_num_b, wkt_before_a, wkt_after_a, wkt_produce_a, qty_produce_a, wkt_worker_a, wkc_worker_num_a, mo_rmb_wkc_rmk01, mo_rmb_wkc_rmk02, mo_rmb_wkc_rmk03, mo_rmb_wkc_rmk04, mo_rmb_wkc_rmk05, mo_rmb_wkc_rmk06, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM mo_rmb_wkc WHERE unode = @unode;
